text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Welcome! This is the place where we display the trophies acquired in races!
Imploration! Achieve victory in every kind of race, and I ask that you fill this room with prize cups!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Vision! Complete mastery of the trophies!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: That shimmer of prize cups lined up without gaps—I must! See it before the very end!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Of course! I also wish for the success of the Umamusume belonging to my Tracen Academy.
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: By the way, I will also grant rewards according to the number of trophies acquired. Be sure to check the Missions!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: My dream and the future of the Umamusume—I have entrusted them to you!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
